summary: An asynchronous WebSocket client tailored for the Poloniex futures exchange that establishes and maintains connections, negotiates protocols, manages subscriptions, authenticates users, and parses incoming messages into standardized market data (order books, tickers, trades) and account information (balances, orders).
business_intent: Enable applications such as trading bots, analytics platforms, and portfolio managers to receive live futures market updates and interact with private account data on Poloniex through a unified, realâ€‘time interface.
